main_definition: A connoisseur who has refined taste in food, especially when it comes to fine dining or high-quality ingredients.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Admirer of good cooking and appreciation for gourmet food
meanings_and_examples.example: She is a true gourmet, always seeking out the best restaurants in town.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who enjoys or specializes in fine foods and drinks
meanings_and_examples.example: The chef prides himself on being a dedicated gourmet with extensive knowledge of various cuisines.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Refined taste in eating, often associated with high-quality ingredients and elaborate dishes
meanings_and_examples.example: His palate is highly developed; he can distinguish between different types of cheese and wines like a true gourmet.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person who enjoys indulging in luxury foods, often associated with high-end dining experiences
meanings_and_examples.example: As a wealthy individual, he enjoys frequenting exclusive gourmet restaurants that serve lavish and exquisite meals.
